    • Constructor Detail

      • Menu

        public Menu(int score,
            int highScore)
        Menu constuctor.
        Parameters:
        score - Current score in the game.
        highScore - Highest score when played the game.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        This is the most important method in this class. It generates and creates all of the buttons and panels which are all user-interactive. Keeps track of where the user is located in the menu.
        Parameters:
        drawer - PApplet object which allows drawing the menu, select, help, end, and win screens.
